oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1945-05-05 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 5, 1945. Featuring Louie Buck (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer), and performers Rachel Veach, Bashful Brother Oswald, Minnie Pearl, Mac McGar, and the Old Hickory Singers. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bashful Brother Oswald; Rachel Veach; Minnie Pearl; Mac McGar; Roy Acuff; Old Hickory Singers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Prince Albert commercial (Louie Buck) -- Roy Acuff introduces Bashful Brother Oswald and Rachel Veach -- Take Me Back To Tennessee (Bashful Brother Oswald, Rachel Veach) -- Roy Acuff introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Roy Acuff introduces Mac McGar -- Nobody's Sweetheart Now (Mac McGar mandolin) -- Roy Acuff talks -- Farther Along (Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert commercial (Louie Buck) -- Roy Acuff introduces the Old Hickory Singers -- My Pretty Quadroon (Old Hickory Singers) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Bashful Brother Oswald, Louie Buck) -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Acuff, Roy; Bashful Brother Oswald; Veach, Rachel; McGar, Mac; Minnie Pearl; Old Hickory Singers
